page.title: 09FOREST TOWN JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: There are eight teachers at Forest Town Junior School. Mr. Dennis is the headmaster. There are seven classes in the main school. When we go for assemblies we go in the main school. For our dinner we go in the canteen. We have assembly on a Monday and Tuesday. We also have a house assembly on a Friday. We have games on a Friday and P.E. on a Monday. We do Maths every day. We do English and we have a project. Inside the school there is a library. Mr. Young comes and teaches us about first aid but particularly about lungs. We did experiments on how our lungs get blocked up. We're doing a Doomsday book. We're writing about Forest Town and its suooroundings. {Craig Moon, KEVIN McGLONE
